channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Pipeline: Groovy Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Pipeline: Groovy Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-1003030|2024-08-05T03:00:19.350Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20groovy%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability exists in Jenkins Pipeline: Groovy Plugin 2.63 and earlier in pom.xml, src/main/java/org/jenkinsci/plugins/workflow/cps/CpsGroovyShell.java that allows attackers able to control pipeline scripts to execute arbitrary code on the Jenkins master JVM.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003041|2024-08-05T03:07:17.842Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20groovy%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability in Jenkins Pipeline: Groovy Plugin 2.64 and earlier allows attackers to invoke arbitrary constructors in sandboxed scripts.
